div.bibl: Chicago Jewish Chronicle, July 26, 1929. THE DEUTSCH FOUNDATION EDITORIALS.

body.p: The gift by friends of the late Samuel Deutsch of $177,000 for the establishment of the Samuel Deutsch Foundation at the University of Chicago will be dedicated to the same purpose for which Mr. Deutsch spent so much of his active life.
The money will be spent in research work in philanthropy in the Graduate School of Social Service Administration.
